title.native: カードファイト!! ヴァンガード (2018)

description:
The main protagonist Sendou Aichi, is a timid and mundane third-year middle school boy. The thing that supported Aichi's heart, was the "Blaster Blade" card that he received as a child. It's an important rare card from "Vanguard", a card game with the imaginary world of "Planet Cray" as its stage. From the day he reunited with the person who gave him that card "Toshiki Kai", Aichi's everyday life began to change.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

node.description: Akira Ito (伊藤 彰, Itō Akira) is a manga artist. Ito drew Yu-Gi-Oh! R while the creator of the Yu-Gi-Oh! franchise, Kazuki Takahashi, came up with the storyline. Ito's drawing style is similar to Takahashi's. Ito later co-created Cardfight!! Vanguard in collaboration with Satoshi Nakamura (technical advisor for Duel Masters) and Bushiroad president Takaaki Kidani, he is also the author of Cardfight!! Vanguard manga and Cardfight!! Vanguard G: THE PROLOGUE, as well as the illustrator/designer of several cards in the Cardfight!! Vanguard game.

Milky Holmes are - Suzuko Mimori as Sherlock Shellinford, - Sora Tokui as Nero Yuzurizaki, - Mikoi Sasaki as Hercules Barton, and - Izumi Kitta as Cordelia Glauca.  They are a seiyuu unit from/for the anime Tantei Opera Milky Holmes. When performing a live, each member wears a certain cosplay to look like her 2D counterpart from the anime.

[Profile](http://www.kenproduction.co.jp/talent/member.php?mem=m47) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/numanumakapa)

Married voice actress [Yuka Nishigaki](https://anilist.co/staff/105045) in 2015. Part of the trio Trignal with fellow voice actors [Takuya Eguchi](https://anilist.co/staff/102695/Takuya-Eguchi) and [Ryohei Kimura](https://anilist.co/staff/96762). Hosts radio programs for Kiramune.

RAISE A SUILEN is an all-girl band in the BanG Dream! franchise. The group consists of five members:
- [Raychell](https://anilist.co/staff/137051/Raychell) (as [LAYER](https://anilist.co/character/136983/Rei-Wakana)) on lead vocals and bass
- [Riko Kohara](https://anilist.co/staff/120173/Riko-Kohara) (as [LOCK](https://anilist.co/character/133744/Rokka-Asahi)) on guitar
- [Natsume](https://anilist.co/staff/137052/Natsume) (as [MASKING](https://anilist.co/character/136984/Masuki-Satou)) on drums
- [Reo Kurachi](https://anilist.co/staff/137053/Reo-Kurachi) (as [PAREO](https://anilist.co/character/136985/Reona-Nyubara)) on keyboard
- [Risa Tsumugi](https://anilist.co/staff/137054/Risa-Tsumugi) (as [CHU²](https://anilist.co/character/136986/Chiyu-Tamade)) as DJ

They were tentatively given the name THE THIRD(仮) before getting their official name. The group was initially formed as a backup band for the vocalists of Afterglow, Pastel*Palettes, and Hello, Happy World! due to them being unable to play their characters' instruments. It was then revealed during the second live that THE THIRD has officially become part of the franchise, along with a new name, RAISE A SUILEN, and a newly recruited member, Risa Tsumugi.

Roselia is an all-girl band in the BanG Dream! franchise. The group consists of five members:
- [Aina Aiba](https://anilist.co/staff/126659/Aina-Aiba) (as [Yukina Minato](https://anilist.co/character/128146/Yukina-Minato)) on vocals
- [Haruka Kudo](https://anilist.co/staff/95110/Haruka-Kudou) (as [Sayo Hikawa](https://anilist.co/character/126259/Sayo-Hikawa)) on guitar
- [Megu Sakuragawa](https://anilist.co/staff/115586/Megu-Sakuragawa) (as [Ako Udagawa](https://anilist.co/character/128144/Ako-Udagawa)) on drums
- [Kanon Shizaki](https://anilist.co/staff/129512/Kanon-Shizaki) (as [Rinko Shirokane](https://anilist.co/character/128143/Rinko-Shirokane)) on keyboard
- [Yuki Nakashima](https://anilist.co/staff/128152/Yuki-Nakashima) (as [Lisa Imai](https://anilist.co/character/128147/Lisa-Imai)) on bass

[Yurika Endou](https://anilist.co/staff/118480/Yurika-Endou) was the previous bassist and voice actor for Lisa up until May 2018, when she retired from the entertainment industry and was replaced with Nakashima.
[Satomi Akesaka](https://anilist.co/staff/95723/Satomi-Akesaka) was the previous keyboardist and Rinko's VA until September 2018, when she was forced to step down after suffering sudden deafness twice, and was replaced with Shizaki. 

Roselia's band name was coined from combining the words Rose and Camellia. They debuted with the song "BLACK SHOUT".

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/abe_atsuize) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/阿部敦)

Affiliated with Ken Production.

Non-anime roles:

Cheren - Pokémon Masters EX (VG)
Wise - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

__Height:__ 150 cm

[Fanclub](https://www.gokinjolno.jp/) | [Blog](http://nanjolno.jugem.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nanjolno) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nanjolno/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFJORT2GGeNsKKLCf3BqSEQ)

She was the vocalist of the band fripSide and graduated in April 2022 with the fripSide Phase 2 Final Arena Tour. Likes cats, Final Fantasy XIV (even dubbed and sung the battle theme of Suzaku), and ramen.

**Non anime roles:**
- Soltina - Memento Mori (VG)
- Noise - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Topaz - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
- Shu - Arknights (VG)
- Junah - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)
- Trigger - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/aimi_sound) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/aimin_official/)

A voice actor and musician, notably the lead vocalist and guitarist of [Poppin'Party](https://anilist.co/staff/153185/PoppinParty). Aimi had dreamed of becoming a singer ever since she was young. She initially only aspired to become a singer, but she became interested in voice acting after becoming familiar with the anime series Macross Frontier, where she was impressed at how the series was able to combine music and animation in its storytelling. 

In order to make her dream come true, she participated in various contests, such as the “Best of Singer Contest National Championship 2008”, which she made into the Finals but lost. She was one of 3rd ANIMAX Anison Grand Prix Finalists with Sayaka Sasaki in 2009, and was a winner of the Osaka block. On February 6th, 2010, she made it to the finals of the “Aim for Ellie! Milky Holmes Seiyuu Audition”, a seiyuu audition tour hosted by DWANGO Creative School, but lost the role to Mikoi Sasaki. However, she did make her debut as a seiyuu in the Milky Holmes anime.

Aimi was the guitarist of a girls' band in high school and self-taught, but quit playing after graduating. She picked it up back in 2014 and used it to perform during her THE iDOLM@STER Million Live! live performances as Julia. Aimi is the influence and where Kidani Takaaki, the president of Bushiroad, got his idea for the BanG Dream! franchise from - after seeing Aimi playing the guitar during THE IDOLM@STER M@STERS OF IDOL WORLD!! 2014. 

She used her full name for her voice actress career and Aimi (愛美) for her singer career, but she started to use the latter for both since December 2013.

(Source: BanG Dream! Wikia)

**Non-Anime Roles**:
- Brünhilde - Azur Lane (VG)
- Mica - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Serval - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
- Yan - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
